title: China cracks down on US IPOs, winning founder qualities, Ask Jason: accelerators, investing | E1244
description: Jason covers the CCP crackdown on Chinese tech companies listing in the US, shares how he spots winning founders (14:02), then answers Ask Jason questions: finding a technical co-founder (36:47), signals for startup success (39:29), advice for new angel investors (45:18), and more.
